basics.name: Adil Leghari
basics.label: Senior Solutions Engineer | Cloud & Security Architect | CNAPP & Zero Trust Specialist
basics.summary: Senior Solutions Engineer with 15+ years of experience helping enterprises secure and accelerate their multi-cloud adoption across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Proven success in pre-sales, cloud security architecture, and executive storytelling that drives measurable business outcomes. Recognized for translating complex technical concepts into business value, mentoring high-performing SE teams, and enabling organizations to adopt Zero Trust and CNAPP strategies. Experienced across Education/Public Sector, startups, and Fortune 500 environments, offering a unique perspective on how teams evolve through growth and transformation.

Provide mentorship and enablement to peers and partner architects to scale customer success across the region
